name: Spaciocity
description:
This game was created for the Leap Motion 3D Jam. There is a lot that is set up and ready to make this into a much richer game with more enemies, guns, powerups, etc. All the code is there, just need the assets. But, alas, I'm a one-man dev team. I do plan to continue developing it, though.

THE MAC AND LINUX BUILDS HAVE NOT BEEN TESTED! If you want to be sure it will run, use the Windows build until this text changes. :)
